attributes.action: For Ozzy Osbourne to receive a Knighthood for services to music and Birmingham
attributes.additional_details: Ozzy's battle with Parkinson's and still managed to arrange and a charity gig raising over £140 Million for three important charitys! (Parkinsons foundation, Acorns and Birmingham Children's Hospital) To do all this while battling with Parkinson's is amazing and he is such an important character in British Music History!
attributes.background: To push for Ozzy Osbourne to receive a Knighthood for his dedication to music and founding a very important music genre! For also helping put Birmingham on the map

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: https://www.gov.uk/honours
